text: Vladimir Grigoryevich Yegorov (; 26 November 1938 – 8 June 2022) was a Russian politician and military person. He was the governor of Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia from 2001 to 2005. He was Admiral commanding the Baltic Fleet before he became governor. He was born in Moscow, Russia., undated (accessed 2 February 2007) Yegorov died in Kaliningrad, Russia on 8 June 2022, aged 83.Скончался Владимир Григорьевич Егоров — бывший командующий Балтфлотом, третий губернатор Калининградской области, почётный гражданин Калининграда и области ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian military people Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:People from Kaliningrad Oblast
title: Vladimir Yegorov
